title: How come I suddenly own Kayle???
body: I found out I own Kayle now when I checked my owned champions. I don't remember anything about purchasing her before. Did I miss anything???

replies.body: As a [thank you](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/riot-games/announcements/thank-you), Riot gifted players Riot Kayle for as an anniversary present.  Looking into this for you, this seems to be the case for your account.  Enjoy!
It is a gift given by rito for free including the Riot Kayle skin as a celebration for their anniversary i think.It was like a month ago i guess.{{champion:10}}
